DEFAULT_RESPONSE_ERROR: Can't execute action. Please try again.
SKIP_FOR_NOW: Remember: For a valid authentication as a driver, the partner who owns this transport unit must have previously logged in.
TRANSPORT_UNIT_INACTIVE: This vehicle is not traveling a route.
enter_email_for_password_reset: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password´s account.
enter_email_for_pin_reset: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your PIN.
recovery_link_sent: We just sent you a recovery account link to your email. Please check your inbox and read the instructions described.
want_to_sign_out: Are you sure to close your session?
SELECT_TRANSPORT_INSTRUCTION: Select the transport you want to relate with the charges.
SELECT_TRANSPORT_INSTRUCTION_B: Select the transport you want to relate with the charges.
WARNING_SKIP_SETUP: The charge function will be DISABLED until you connect this device with the proximity reader assigned in the transport. Do you want to continue?
NO_ACTIVE_CONNECTION: There is no active connection with the proximity reader and this device. To solve the problem try the following options.
MAKE_CONNECTION_INSTRUCTION: Make the connection to the proximity reader.
FAQS_INSTRUCTION: See the most common problems and solutions in our user manual.
SUPPORT_INSTRUCTION: If the connection problem persists, contact our technical support to be attended to as soon as possible.
